com.sugarcrm.candybean.utilities

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sugarcrm.candybean.utilities.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Utils is simply a container for automation/Java-related helper functions that are relatively non-specific to any particular library/framework.
    Author:
    cwarmbold, wli, Jason Lin (ylin)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Utils.Pair<X,Y>
      Pair is a python-2-tuple lightweight equivalent for convenience.
      static class  Utils.Triplet<X,Y,Z>
      Triplet is a python-3-tuple lightweight equivalent for convenience.
